item.title: Delhivery jumps 89% in last 6 months: Should you still buy?

review.headline_rewrite: Delhivery jumps 89% in last 6 months: Should you still buy?
bullets: However, InCred has reinitiated coverage with a ‘Reduce’ rating and a target price of ₹300, implying a potential 36% downside from current levels.
The brokerage flagged concerns over the near-term impact of its Ecom Express acquisition, intensifying competition from Amazon and Flipkart’s entry into the third party
Over the last year, the stock has gained 15%, including a 10% rise in August, marking its sixth consecutive month of gains.
This, coupled with low operating leverage and increased competition from Ekart and Amazon in the 3PL cargo space, could limit margin expansion.

item.title: Fitch, S&P rate SBI's proposed US dollar bond issuance. Check details

review.headline_rewrite: Fitch, S&P rate SBI's proposed US dollar bond issuance. Check details
bullets: Fitch Ratings on Tuesday assigned a 'BBB-(EXP)' rating to State Bank of India's proposed US dollar-denominated bond issuance.
Separately, S&P Global Ratings has also assigned its 'BBB' long-term issue rating to the US dollar-denominated senior unsecured notes that the London branch of
The rating agencies did not specify the amount that the London Branch of State Bank of India (SBI) will raise through the issuance of
"The rating on the notes is equal to the long-term issuer credit rating on SBI (BBB/Stable/A-2).

item.title: One-third of FY25 renewable bids come with storage

bullets: CareEdge Ratings points out that the power sector is undergoing a significant transformation, with renewable energy (RE) poised to drive future capacity additions.

item.title: Suzlon's S144 wind turbines record lowest carbon footprint

review.headline_rewrite: Suzlon's S144 wind turbines record lowest carbon footprint
bullets: + 314.49 + 104.15 + 27.00 + 198.00 + 165.00 Renewable energy solutions provider Suzlon on Tuesday said its 'Made in India' wind turbine
Suzlon has redesigned the turbine to cut steel use by 2.5 times, incorporating recycled steel and scrap, while sourcing 83.25 per cent of components
